title: Come on Riot... Why do I only have 1/4 of my screen in the game..
body: What is this DirectX issue that never happened before which is ruining my teammates, enemies, and myself's game experience... Please fix it fast.

replies.body: the same thing just happened to me.. im playing on my mac book pro at highest graphical settings and changing the resolution did not alter the screen
I changed the resolution, then it went okay for me. Hope your game interface is okay by now :)

Same thing here. Playing on my macbook pro.. tried everything, restarting the client, restarting my pc, reinstalling league and client repair. 
I've send riot a ticket about it, but no reply yet.
Try change your settings from your client interface. I changed the resolution, then it went okay for me. Hope it helps.

DirectX issues can happen for a few reasons, but I've been investigating a few posts this morning after the patch and think it may be a resolution issue.  Just to help rule out this possibility, what resolution is you game at?  What happens if you change it or make it lower?  Final question, or you on a 4K or exceeding 1080p?  This info will help me figure out what's going on.  Sorry for the trouble you've gone through in-game, and I look forward to hearing back!
I am having the same problem following the latest update.  This caused me to lose a promo game, I restarted my computer and this did not fix anything.
